title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1730-1.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1730-1.1 - General

State Regulations
(a) This Part
outlines the insurance requirements of the division with respect to housing
companies constructed under the limited profit and limited dividend housing
programs. The housing company is responsible for having State-aided housing
companies adequately covered at all times by necessary insurance and bonds, in
accordance with the requirements set forth herein. (b) The insurance coverages listed are
intended to provide adequate protection against hazards. Exposures that
develop, aside from those herein contemplated, shall be treated as they arise. Adequate protection must be maintained at all times. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1730-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
